product_name: CygoLite Streak 310 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Versatility in a powerfully compact form, the 310-lumen USB rechargeable Streak offers commuters and road riders exceptional brightness and 6 illumination modes for both night and day riding.
short_description: Versatility in a powerfully compact form, the 310-lumen USB rechargeable Streak offers commuters and road riders exceptional brightness and 6 illumination modes for both night and day riding.
